alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Worcester, eastern Hampshire and northeastern Hampden Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 815 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Brookfield, or 15 miles west of Worcester, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Grafton, Webster, Auburn, Northbridge, Oxford, Uxbridge, Millbury, Charlton, Palmer, Spencer, Dudley, Leicester, Ware, Sturbridge, Sutton, Douglas, Rutland, Upton and Barre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Southern Worcester
